title: List Comprehensions Practice
instructions: Practice creating lists using comprehensions with transformations, filters, and conditions.
hints: Use comprehension with filter: [x**2 for x in numbers if x % 2 == 0]
Filter by length: [len(w) for w in words if len(w) >= min_length]
Nested comprehension: [num for row in matrix for num in row]
Nested list comprehension: [[0 for _ in range(cols)] for _ in range(rows)]
description: Practice creating lists using comprehensions with transformations, filters, and conditions.
